description: Submission of reserved matters application (layout and sitting, design of buildings, external appearance, landscaping and open space, and car parking) pursuant to condition 2 of outline planning permission reference 14/0117/O dated 02/04/2015 for redevelopment of the Maryon Road and Grove Estate comprising of the construction of 165 residential units and associated open space, landscaping, car parking and infrastructure This development may impact on the setting of the adjacent Grade II listed Woodhill School, Grade II listed Church of St Thomas and the adjacent Woolwich Common Conservation Area
site_name: Maryon Road & Maryon Grove Estate, Maryon Road and Maryon Grove, SE7
